name: Puzzlium — The First Puzzle Social Network
name_original: Puzzlium — The First Puzzle Social Network
description:
PLAY fun, addictive puzzle games in a very simple and intuitive way. Over 130,000 human-crafted challenges to start with. Switch between newest, popular, most liked, easy, and hard challenges. Enjoy 11 puzzle games:
• Dot Solitaire
• Slide Away
• Math Swap
• Hexa Cut
• Connections
• Sudoku
• Elastic
• Wire Tangram
• Tetromino
• Cut by Painting
• Tangram

CREATE new challenges to express your imagination to the world. Feel the power of creating a real interactive value playable by millions.

COMPETE with other solvers to prove your smartness and speed. The more challenges you solve and create, the higher rank you get.

EARN experience from solving challenges. Or even better - create new challenges and get stars from other solvers. Spend stars to open and publish challenges.

SHARE puzzle games to challenge your friends, family, or the world. Share your creations to get more solvers to your puzzles. The more puzzle games you share, the more stars you get.

New puzzle games and features to come soon.
